title: Donald Trump Jr. on Mueller & 2020 Elections
itunes:title: Donald Trump Jr. on Mueller & 2020 Elections
description:
Kevin spoke with Donald Trump Jr. about Mueller report, Democrats, and the mainstream media.Therese Raphael, Bloomberg Opinion editor, discusses the latest Brexit developments.Kevin also spoke with Deanna Bass, Partner at Bass Public Affairs, Former Deputy Chief of Staff to Dr. Ben Carson in his role as Secretary of The Department of Housing and Urban Development, and Cristina Antelo, Principal at Ferox Strategies.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
